column1: #text=The library has so many books to choose from , it 's hard to decide which one to borrow .
#text=Looking around at all the shelves of books , I decided I wanted an adventure book .
#text=The librarian was nice enough to help me look for a good book to borrow .
#text=I decided on a pirate adventure book .
#text=But before I could borrow it , I had to get a library card .
#text=We walked over to the counter , and she helped me sign up for a library card .
#text=All I had to do was tell her a few things like my name and my address , and I had my very own library card .
#text=Once I had that , it was easy to check out the book .
#text=She scanned my library card , punched some buttons on her computer , and the book was mine to borrow .
#text=I 'll be sure to bring it back in a few days so I do n't have to pay any late fees .
